org.nodes.classification

Interface Classifier<P>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassifier

    public interface Classifier<P>
    A class which assigns points to one of a fixed number of categories. Classes are represented by non-negative integers. If integer n is a class then all integers below it are also valid classes.
    Author:
    Peter

      • probabilities

        java.util.List<java.lang.Double> probabilities(P point)
        Returns a probability distribution over classes for the given point. The values returned may also be densities, and so do not necessarily sum to one.
